page.title: 15MEDIA (SURVEY FINDINGS)
page.content: {NATIONAL NEWSPAPERS Out of 30 households 14% took The Sun, 8% The Star, 17% The Telegraph, 17% the Daily Mail, 11% the Daily Express, 6% The Mirror, 27% had no regulary daily paper. {LOCAL NEWSPAPERS The Retford Times was taken by 92%, The Newark Advertiser 4%, The Lincolnshire Chronicle 4%. Free papers are delivered to all the households in the area. These include The North Notts. Guardian,The Mid-Week Guardian and The Retford Journal. {RADIO 41% prefer Radio 4, 34% Radio 2,45% expressed no preference, but did listen to the radio. {MAGAZINES} More popular magazines are farming, gardening and womens. There is also a Church Magazine.
